title: utybbas2
author: utybbas2

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: utybbas2 on June 15, 2023, 12:26:21 AMrequire people to help me with some prompts together with me for a Ebook I'm working on with,using mainly chatgpt and that bing AI one. payment in ethereum telegram : Ubbyybrad4You should provide more details on what is it that you really want so you are not wasting your time and those who are interested, provide the kind of work that you need and what are the requirements or skills that you want for those who are interested, and how much is the payment.Do you want reviews from users who will test the ChatGpt? Or do you want a writer for additional input on an e-book you are working with?

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: utybbas2 on June 15, 2023, 12:26:21 AMrequire people to help me with some prompts together with me for a Ebook I'm working on with,using mainly chatgpt and that bing AI one. payment in ethereum telegram : Ubbyybrad4If you're writing an e-book purely with the help of Chatgpt then sorry I don't contribute to a project that's generated with the help of AI and has no input from humans. I have firm belief that the generated text from Chatgpt is misusing of other authors hard work and is mainly reproduction of a writers copyrighted work without even mentioning their names or original articles in references. An e-book purely created by AI is not a good thing to loot money from innocent readers because if I'm not wrong then the users have to pay you to read that e-book, and that's totally injustice with those users because the writer of the e-book hasn't done anything to write that e-book but used an AI called Chatgpt to generate the whole text.If your intention in writing of the e-book is to help others in mastering of Chatgpt prompts then count me in because that's going to be a useful thing for the readers to learn. I will surely help you in creation of such e-book that could help the readers to master the prompts of Chatgpt so that they could use that AI to learn some good things or create something unique. The AI is quite capable of writing programming code and may help you to learn some basic concepts regarding many topics. However, using it for commercial gain isn't a fair thing because that would be against the rights of the authors whose texts have been used has datasets to train that AI. I hope you got my point, if you really want to help others with that e-book then I'm in and I assure you that I will write the e-book in cheap rates because I believe that such e-book could be very helpful for students.

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: utybbas2 on June 15, 2023, 12:26:21 AMrequire people to help me with some prompts together with me for a Ebook I'm working on with,using mainly chatgpt and that bing AI one. payment in ethereum telegram : Ubbyybrad4ChatGPT already provides you with a lot of help for free, why do you need more help on your project?It will be even better if you can elaborate on what exactly needs to be done. Getting the material from AI and converting it into the E-book or it something else?How much you are willing to pay for this work?By the Payment in Ethereum? This service should not be posted in the services section then.

comments.author: tjtonmoy
comments.body: I am not interested in this, tho. But I would like to give you a suggestion. Use Merlin ChatGPT (web access and GPT-4 engine available) or Harpa AI. These extensions can be added to the browser and, with built-in commands, you can use them to enhance your own prompts. Give it a try and there are many tutorials and other AI tools that uses the same thing. DYOR.
